title: Escaping Line
prompt: Draw a line that is trying to escape from the page.
tip: Decide what it is escaping from.

title: Lost Line
prompt: Draw a line that gets lost and slowly finds its way.

title: Following Line
prompt: Draw one line that follows another closely.
tip: Let the leader change direction suddenly.

title: Interrupted Story
prompt: Draw a line story that keeps getting interrupted.

title: Weather Lines
prompt: Draw lines reacting to imaginary wind or rain.

title: Travel Path
prompt: Draw the journey of a line across the page.

title: Protective Lines
prompt: Draw lines forming a protective space.

title: Chasing Lines
prompt: Draw one line chasing another.

title: Growing Maze
prompt: Create a maze that grows as you draw.

title: Broken Journey
prompt: Draw a path that breaks and reconnects.

title: Object With a Past
prompt: Draw an object as if it has been used for many years.

title: Just After Use
prompt: Draw an object just after someone used it.
tip: Imagine the person left moments ago.

title: Hidden Side
prompt: Draw only the side of an object that is usually hidden.

title: Partial Memory
prompt: Draw an object from memory, then add missing parts after looking.

title: Close Encounter
prompt: Draw a very close-up view of an object.

title: Far View
prompt: Draw the same object very small on the page.

title: Before Touch
prompt: Draw an object before anyone touches it.

title: After Touch
prompt: Draw the same object after it has been handled.

title: Empty Evidence
prompt: Draw only the empty space left by an object.

title: Object Story
prompt: Draw an object and add one clue about its owner.

title: Almost Falling
prompt: Draw a person about to fall but not yet.

title: Trying to Balance
prompt: Draw someone trying to balance something unstable.

title: Carrying Carefully
prompt: Draw someone carrying something fragile.

title: Sudden Stop
prompt: Draw a person stopping suddenly.

title: Quiet Movement
prompt: Draw someone moving without being noticed.

title: Heavy Door
prompt: Draw someone pushing open a heavy door.

title: Pulling Back
prompt: Draw someone pulling something toward themselves.

title: Reaching Too Far
prompt: Draw a person reaching just beyond their limit.

title: Dodging
prompt: Draw a person dodging something fast.

title: Recovering
prompt: Draw a person recovering after a fall or slip.

title: Living Object
prompt: Draw an everyday object that is alive.

title: Secret Room
prompt: Draw a hidden room inside a normal place.

title: Helpful Creature
prompt: Draw a creature that helps with a small problem.

title: Strange Tool
prompt: Design a tool for a problem that does not exist.

title: Classroom Myth
prompt: Draw a myth or legend that takes place in your classroom.

title: Moving Furniture
prompt: Draw furniture that moves on its own.

title: Future Object
prompt: Draw an object from the future used for daily life.

title: Invisible Thing
prompt: Draw something invisible by showing its effect.

title: Pocket World
prompt: Draw a tiny world that fits in a pocket.

title: Night Version
prompt: Draw a daytime object as it appears at night.
